name: Souls Fayber
description:
After having lost your life, you having a second chance. You must recover all souls to revive. Explore and find all souls in a 2D pixel world with 2 colors with your little ghost called fayber.

The goal is to catch all lost souls with your best record. All souls are dispersed under the world. Find them all, good luck !

The game offer you a little tutorial and story before to starting your adventure. ( You can pass it fastly )

Controls :

  • Jump -> X
  • Switch color -> C
  • Move -> Right and Left arrow
  • Game stats -> Arrow down

You can switch over 15 colors when you play.

Fayber can also fly thanks to its body. It will be useful for catching some souls in height.

Enjoy with Souls Fayber !
